scripts.dev: npm run dev -w apps/api & npm run dev -w apps/web
scripts.build: npm run build -w apps/api && npm run build -w apps/web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w apps/api && npm run lint -w apps/web
scripts.e2e:report: npm run e2e:requirements && npm run e2e:ui-inventory && npm run e2e:crawler
scripts.docker:dev:up: COMPOSE_BAKE=true DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker compose --profile dev up -d --build
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild: COMPOSE_BAKE=true DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker compose --profile dev build --parallel --no-cache && COMPOSE_BAKE=true DOCKER_BUILDKIT=1 docker compose --profile dev up -d --force-recreate
scripts.docker:dev:logs: docker compose --profile dev logs -f web-dev api-dev
